title: Holiday in Marrakech For Two, With Return Flights and Five Star Accommodation for Three Nights (£369) or Five Nights (£449) at Albatros Garden Hotel (Save 50%)
highlights:
• Five star hotel
  • Return flight from Gatwick with easyJet
  • Swimming pool, fitness suite, tennis court and golf nearby
  • Double or twin room with balcony or terrace; pool or garden view
  • Aqua park accessible via free shuttle bus
  • One free entrance to aqua park per person
  • Free late check-out before 2pm
  • 20% discount for spa facilities
